description: The adversary entices the user or uses access by the AI system to create a resource with malicious instructions and share it widely within the organization. Variants include SharePoint and Google Drive documents accessible company-wide.
name: Shared Resource Poisoning

object_references.description: An adversary can infect threads by other uses by creating a company-wide shared resource indexes by the RAG system.
Shared Resource Poisoning is a form of RAG Poisoning, leveraging acquired intra-company access for lateral movement.
